channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says his daughter-in-law is his top choice to run for Sen. Thom Tillis' seat
item.description: President Trump said his "first choice" to replace Sen. Thom Tillis of North Carolina would be his daughter-in-law, Lara Trump.

item.title: The Senate Budget Offers ‘Dessert First, Spinach Later’
item.description: It would perpetuate a system where politicians impose massive tax burdens on future generations to enrich today’s special interests.

item.title: All 45 Senate Dems Just Voted For A $4 Trillion Tax Increase
item.description: Democrats are forever working against Trump instead of for voters. They would rather win a political battle than let Americans keep tax breaks.

item.title: Drugs Are Cheaper Here Than Abroad, and Other Countries Should Adopt Our Model
